directions: Remove the thick stems of the callaloo leaves, chop roughly, and put into a large saucepan.  Add the chicken stock, onion, beef, black pepper, shallots, thyme, chili pepper, and crab meat.  Cover, and simmer until meat is tender, about 35 minutes.
Add the okra, and cook for 8 minutes.
Remove the chili pepper. Puree the soup in a blender or food processor.  Reheat, and adjust seasonings.
ingredients: 1/2 pound salt beef, fat removed and diced
title: Callaloo Soup
